title: Born of an Angel
description: Good vs evil, easy to distinguish, right? Or not… Michael, the fallen angel is sent to earth to kill the one born of an Should be a simple task for a hardened cherub, but after meeting the one, he hesitates. Dark, brooding and a little intimidating, Patches’s new professor doesn't seem the sociable type. But after getting to know him, she learns there’s more than meets the eye… Love finds you in the most unexpected places as both will soon learn.
author: Lisa Glenn
